item.description:
We'll be meeting at Kendall Square Cinema at 6:50 PM for the 7:15 screening; feel free to bring friends and family!

If you get lost, contact Scott, who will be the organizer for this event -- introduce yourself to him when you arrive, and trust him to moderate negotations afterwards as members debate whether to go to the Cambridge Brewing Company or Johnny Flattops. His number is 617-834-6831.
item.how_to_find_us: Scott will have his cell phone: 617-834-6831
item.name: PART II: Boston Atheists at "Religulous"
